keyMoments.title: Zoro's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Roronoa Zoro is shown tied up at the Marine base in Shells Town, enduring his punishment without food or water.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the future first mate of the Straw Hat Pirates and establishment of his unwavering willpower.
keyMoments.quote: I can not die in a place like this!

keyMoments.title: Kuina Flashback
keyMoments.description: A brief flashback shows young Zoro training with a girl named Kuina, hinting at his past.
keyMoments.significance: First glimpse into Zoro's motivation to become the world's greatest swordsman.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Agrees to Join Luffy
keyMoments.description: After Luffy retrieves his swords and helps him, Zoro agrees to join Luffy's crew to become a pirate.
keyMoments.significance: The first crew member officially joins the Straw Hat Pirates.

bounties.reason: Not yet a wanted pirate, currently a pirate hunter

abilities.description: Zoro's signature three-sword fighting style, wielding swords in both hands and one in his mouth.

relationships.description: Zoro becomes Luffy's first crew member and trusted companion.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy offers Zoro a place on his crew and retrieves his swords, earning Zoro's loyalty.

relationships.description: Zoro's childhood friend and rival who inspired his dream to become the world's greatest swordsman.

evolutionMoments.description: Brief flashback shows young Zoro training with Kuina.

reveals.information: Wants to become the world's greatest swordsman
Trained with a girl named Kuina in his childhood

keyMoments.title: Helmeppo's Cruelty
keyMoments.description: Helmeppo appears and destroys the rice balls that young Rika tried to give to Zoro, revealing his cruel nature.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Helmeppo as a spoiled antagonist who abuses his father's power.
keyMoments.quote: Anyone who helps criminals will be hanged!

keyMoments.title: Helmeppo's Father Revealed
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Helmeppo is the son of Captain Morgan, explaining his abuse of power.
keyMoments.significance: Explains why Helmeppo can act with impunity in Shells Town.

relationships.description: Helmeppo is Captain Morgan's spoiled son who exploits his father's authority.

evolutionMoments.description: Helmeppo's relationship to Captain Morgan is revealed.

reveals.information: Spoiled, cruel, and cowardly, exploiting his father's status

keyMoments.title: Captain Morgan Appears
keyMoments.description: Captain Morgan makes his imposing entrance at the Marine base, revealing his axe-hand and tyrannical nature.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the first major Marine antagonist in the series.
keyMoments.quote: Rank means everything in this world... That means everything I do is right!

abilities.description: Morgan wields a large steel axe as his right hand, using it as a formidable weapon.

relationships.description: Morgan is Helmeppo's father, though he shows little genuine affection.

evolutionMoments.description: Morgan is revealed as Helmeppo's father.

reveals.information: Captain of the 153rd Branch of Marines
Tyrannical, corrupt, and obsessed with rank and power

keyMoments.title: Rika Brings Food to Zoro
keyMoments.description: A young girl named Rika sneaks into the Marine base to give rice balls to the imprisoned Zoro.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's kind nature despite his fearsome reputation, and the town's gratitude to him.

relationships.description: Rika is grateful to Zoro for saving her and the townspeople from Helmeppo's wolf.

evolutionMoments.description: Rika tries to bring food to Zoro as thanks for protecting the town.
Ririka is shown as Rika's mother at their restaurant.

reveals.information: Zoro saved Rika and the townspeople from Helmeppo's wolf

keyMoments.title: Kuina Flashback
keyMoments.description: Kuina appears in a brief flashback showing young Zoro training with her.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction to the person who inspired Zoro's dream.

statusHistory.reason: Appears only in flashback, status unclear

relationships.description: Kuina was Zoro's childhood friend and rival in swordsmanship.

evolutionMoments.description: Flashback shows Kuina training with young Zoro.

reveals.information: Zoro trained with Kuina in his childhood

keyMoments.title: Ririka Explains Zoro's Situation
keyMoments.description: Ririka, Rika's mother, explains to Luffy and Koby how Zoro ended up imprisoned.
keyMoments.significance: Provides backstory on why Zoro sacrificed himself for the town.

evolutionMoments.description: Ririka is shown as Rika's mother.
